ValidationRule.description: Makes sure the default date filters are part of the date filters
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "All Time"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "All Time"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_N_DAYS:7"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_N_DAYS:7"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_N_DAYS:7"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_N_DAYS:7"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_N_WEEKS:2"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_N_WEEKS:2"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_N_WEEKS:2"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_N_WEEKS:2"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_N_DAYS:30"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_N_DAYS:30"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_N_DAYS:30"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_N_DAYS:30"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_N_WEEKS:4"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_N_WEEKS:4"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_N_WEEKS:4"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_N_WEEKS:4"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_N_MONTHS:3"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_N_MONTHS:3"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_N_MONTHS:3"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_N_MONTHS:3"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_N_MONTHS:6"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_N_MONTHS:6"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_N_MONTHS:6"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_N_MONTHS:6"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_N_YEARS:3"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_N_YEARS:3"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_N_YEARS:3"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_N_YEARS:3"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_MONTH"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_MONTH"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "THIS_MONTH"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "THIS_MONTH"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_MONTH"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_MONTH"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_QUARTER"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_QUARTER"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "THIS_QUARTER"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "THIS_QUARTER"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_QUARTER"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_QUARTER"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "LAST_YEAR"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "LAST_YEAR"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "THIS_YEAR"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "THIS_YEAR"))), AND(INCLUDES( Default_Date_Filter__c , "NEXT_YEAR"), NOT(INCLUDES( Date_Filters__c , "NEXT_YEAR"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Chosen Default Date Filter values need to be a subset of chosen Date Filters
